pageProduct.name: The Hemp Company Pink Pomelo Lip Balm 20g
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Lip Balm made with Hemp Seed Oil

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. Not for internal use

Common Uses

To moisten dry lips

Ingredients

Ricinus Communis (Castor Oil), Isopropyl myristate, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Polyamide-8 (Pine Resin), Flavour, Silica, Canabis Sativa Seed Oil, Stevia Rebaudiana Leaf/Stem Powder, Tocopherol

Directions

Apply as often as desired to calm irritated, dry and cracked lips or to add moisture to non-irritated lips
